TYPEDERECLAMATION.head: Claim Category
TYPEDERECLAMATION.description: choosing the right category for your claim can help us decide which team to send and waste as little time and money as possible

types.name: Public
types.content: Select this Option if there is any thing related to green spaces

types.name: lightings
types.content: Select this Option if there is Some thing wrong in our Lighting system

types.name: rubbish
types.content: Select this Option if you find any polution

types.name: vendors
types.content: Select this option when ever you see any type of street Vendors

types.name: structures
types.content: Select this option when you find any unconstitutional building

types.name: parking
types.content: Our life and time matter , be safe , Select this option when you find any illicit vehicles parking

types.name: drainage
types.content: Select this option when you find a water leak

types.name: Potholes
types.content: Select this option when you find any potholes or obstacle

ALERTS.0: please hold down on the categorie's picture to get more information about it !
ALERTS.1: sorry You Have To choose one Option From above
